alert.note: Alert for Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains; Gallatin Valley; Northwest Beaverhead County; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 19 at 4:55AM MST until February 22 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations between 5 and 11 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains, Gallatin Valley, Northwest Beaverhead County and Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains. * WHEN...From late Monday night through late Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult and tire chains may be required for some vehicles. Those in the backcountry should ensure they are prepared for dangerous conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind Chills as low as 20 to 35 below zero Tuesday through Thursday night.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains; Gallatin Valley; Northwest Beaverhead County; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains
